name: Yochlol
lore: Yochlols are the Handmaidens of Lolth, the demon queen of spiders. They serve as her spies, emissaries, and enforcers among the drow. A yochlol can take the form of a female drow or a giant spider, and it can dissolve into a toxic gaseous cloud. Utterly devoted to Lolth, they carry out her will in the mortal world and punish those who displease the Spider Queen.

traits.name: Demonic Resilience
traits.description: The yochlol has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The yochlol can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.description: The yochlol ignores movement restrictions caused by webs.

multiattack.description: The yochlol makes two Slam attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) Poison damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The yochlol casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):
At will: Detect Thoughts, Web
1/day each: Dominate Person

actions.name: Mist Form
actions.description: The yochlol transforms into toxic mist or back into its true form. While in mist form, the yochlol can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless, has a Fly Speed of 30 feet (hover), and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. If air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has Advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage. Each creature that starts its turn in the yochlol's space must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 13 (3d8) Poison damage.

savingThrow.targets: each creature that starts its turn in the yochlol's space

bonusActions.name: Change Shape
bonusActions.description: The yochlol transforms into a Medium female Drow or a Medium Giant Spider, or back into its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form, except where noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.
